§ 98. Purchase of supplies without authority No claims for supplies for Indians, purchased without authority of law, shall be paid out of any appropriation for expenses of the Office of Indian Affairs, or for Indians. (R.S. § 2085.)
Editorial Notes Codification R.S. § 2085 derived from act July 15, 1870, ch. 296, § 2, 16 Stat. 360.
